Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash and cash equivalents
effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of long term debt and capital securities net
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
proceeds from repayments of short term debt maturing in three months or less
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance or sale of equity
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term debt and capital securities
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire and develop software
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from divestiture of businesses net of cash divested
proceeds from sale of productive assets
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in retirement related assets and liabilities
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in continuing operations
net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on disposition of assets and other
gain loss on sale of business
net gain loss on divestitures asset sales and other

__unmapped__: net cash flow proceeds from dividend distribution
